ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>Short note: Responses are contextually relevant and consistent with the persona but could be more natural in tone to convey urgency effectively.
baseline_no_context<TAB>2<TAB>1<TAB>3<TAB>2<TAB>Short note: Lacks immediate relevance to the scenario; needs better alignment with NPC role as a healer and clinic setting.
"Needs to address immediate health concern while maintaining professional demeanor."
